name: Demon Wins Everytime
description:
Story

Our ancestors made a deal with a powerful Demon. But it ends today and he demands all the souls in the realm of the livings.

You are the chosen one. And Demon will revive you for his treacherous purposes (and that's why you look like this. Seems He doesn't have a designer mind).

You are revived, as it was told before, to steal the last fragment of soul these mindless poor mob possess. Let the carnage begin!

You don't want to make Him angry.

Gameplay

Use S, A ,D keys to move.

Shout with Mouse 1.

If you find moving challenging, try to press S, and shoot the creatures in front of you while moving backwards.

Survive as much as you can.

Tips

Each creature you kill satisfies the Demon. He doesn't want to lose soul. So try not to.

Creatures are getting stronger over time. Pick the skill that serves you best to deal with them.
